translations.text: Nũn. By the pen and what everyone writes!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Noon walqalami wama yasturoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: By the grace of your Lord, you ˹O Prophet˺ are not insane.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma anta biniAAmati rabbika bimajnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: You will certainly have a never-ending reward.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna laka laajran ghayra mamnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And you are truly ˹a man˺ of outstanding character.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innaka laAAala khuluqin AAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Soon you and the pagans will see,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasatubsiru wayubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: which of you is mad.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bi-ayyikumu almaftoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ

translations.text: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dallaAAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bilmuhtadeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So do not give in to the deniers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala tutiAAi almukaththibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They wish you would compromise so they would yield ˹to you˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waddoo law tudhinu fayudhinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And do not obey the despicable, vain oath-taker,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala tutiAA kulla hallafinmaheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: slanderer, gossip-monger,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hammazin mashsha-in binameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: withholder of good, transgressor, evildoer,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin atheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: brute, and—on top of all that—an illegitimate child.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAutullin baAAda thalika zaneem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Now, ˹simply˺ because he has been blessed with ˹abundant˺ wealth and children,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: An kana tha malinwabaneen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: whenever Our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatunaqala asateeru al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We will soon mark his snout.<sup foot_note=77534>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sanasimuhu AAala alkhurtoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَـٰهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا۟ لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We have tested those ˹Meccans˺ as We tested the owners of the garden—when they swore they would surely harvest ˹all˺ its fruit in the early morning,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna balawnahum kamabalawna as-haba aljannati ith aqsamoolayasrimunnaha musbiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: leaving no thought for Allah’s Will.<sup foot_note=77535>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala yastathnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ

translations.text: Then it was struck by a torment from your Lord while they slept,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatafa AAalayha ta-ifunmin rabbika wahum na-imoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: so it was reduced to ashes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faasbahat kassareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then by daybreak they called out to each other,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatanadaw musbiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَنِ ٱغْدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰرِمِينَ

translations.text: ˹saying,˺ “Go early to your harvest, if you want to pick ˹all˺ the fruit.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ani ighdoo AAala harthikum inkuntum sarimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So they went off, whispering to one another,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fantalaqoo wahum yatakhafatoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌ

translations.text: “Do not let any poor person enter your garden today.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: An la yadkhulannaha alyawmaAAalaykum miskeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And they proceeded early, totally fixated on their purpose.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waghadaw AAala hardin qadireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But when they saw it ˹devastated˺, they cried, “We must have lost ˹our˺ way!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma raawha qalooinna ladalloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal nahnu mahroomoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

translations.text: The most sensible of them said, “Did I not urge you to say, ‘Allah willing.’?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala awsatuhum alam aqul lakumlawla tusabbihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: They replied, “Glory be to our Lord! We have truly been wrongdoers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo subhana rabbinainna kunna thalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then they turned on each other, throwing blame.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdinyatalawamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They said, “Woe to us! We have certainly been transgressors.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ya waylana innakunna tagheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

translations.text: We trust our Lord will give us a better garden than this, ˹for˺ we are indeed turning to our Lord with hope.”<sup foot_note=77536>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAasa rabbuna an yubdilanakhayran minha inna ila rabbina raghiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: That is the ˹way of Our˺ punishment ˹in this world˺. But the punishment of the Hereafter is certainly far worse, if only they knew.<sup foot_note=77537>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika alAAathabu walaAAathabual-akhirati akbaru law kanoo yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will have the Gardens of Bliss with their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna lilmuttaqeena AAinda rabbihim jannatiannaAAeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Should We then treat those who have submitted like the wicked?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AfanajAAalu almuslimeena kalmujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Or do you have a scripture, in which you read
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lakum kitabun feehi tadrusoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: that you will have whatever you choose?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna lakum feehi lama takhayyaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَـٰنٌ عَلَيْنَا بَـٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ

translations.text: Or do you have oaths binding on Us until the Day of Judgment that you will have whatever you decide?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lakum aymanun AAalayna balighatunila yawmi alqiyamati inna lakum lama tahkumoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ which of them can guarantee all that.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Salhum ayyuhum bithalika zaAAeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: Or do they have associate-gods ˹supporting this claim˺? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods, if what they say is true.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lahum shurakao falya/too bishuraka-ihimin kanoo sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ

translations.text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the Shin ˹of Allah˺ will be bared,<sup foot_note=77538>1</sup> and the wicked will be asked to prostrate, but they will not be able to do so,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yukshafu AAan saqin wayudAAawnaila assujoodi fala yastateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَـٰلِمُونَ

translations.text: with eyes downcast, totally covered with disgrace. For they were ˹always˺ called to prostrate ˹in the world˺ when they were fully capable ˹but they chose not to˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: KhashiAAatan absaruhumtarhaquhum thillatun waqad kanoo yudAAawna ilaassujoodi wahum salimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: So leave to Me ˹O Prophet˺ those who reject this message. We will gradually draw them to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatharnee waman yukaththibubihatha alhadeethi sanastadrijuhum min haythula yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I ˹only˺ delay their end for a while, but My planning is flawless.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waomlee lahum inna kaydee mateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ

translations.text: Or are you asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghraminmuthqaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am AAindahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ

translations.text: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not be like ˹Jonah,˺ the Man of the Whale, who cried out ˹to Allah˺, in total distress.<sup foot_note=77539>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasbir lihukmi rabbikawala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nadawahuwa makthoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ

translation.text: surely he would have been thrown

translations.text: Had he not been shown grace by his Lord, he would have certainly been cast onto the open ˹shore˺, still blameworthy.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lawla an tadarakahu niAAmatunmin rabbihi lanubitha bilAAara-i wahuwa mathmoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then his Lord chose him, making him one of the righteous.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fajtabahu rabbuhu fajaAAalahumina assaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌ

translations.text: The disbelievers would almost cut you down with their eyes when they hear ˹you recite˺ the Reminder,<sup foot_note=77540>1</sup> and say, “He is certainly a madman.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in yakadu allatheenakafaroo layuzliqoonaka bi-absarihim lamma samiAAooaththikra wayaqooloona innahu lamajnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But it is simply a reminder to the whole world.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama huwa illa thikrunlilAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
